metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28366 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Certain Neko-related HTML parsers allow a denial of service via craftedProcessing Instruction (PI) input that causes excessive heap memoryconsumption. In particular, this issue exists in HtmlUnit-Neko through2.26, and is fixed in 2.27. This issue also exists in CyberNeko HTMLthrough 1.9.22 (also affecting OWASP AntiSamy before 1.6.6), but 1.9.22 isthe last version of CyberNeko HTML. NOTE: this may be related toCVE-2022-24839.

criterions.comment: libowasp-antisamy-java package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
